description: This dataset contains economic variables gathered from the American Community Survey (ACS) from 2018 to 2022. It contains data  related to household technological infastructure such as cellphones and internet.
source: American Community Survey 5-year data - U.S. Census Bureau

variables.name: hh_no_phone_p
variables.description: Percentage if occupied housing units with no telephone service available
variables.units: Percentage out of total occupied housing units in geography

variables.name: hh_computer_p
variables.description: Percent of households in geography with a computer
variables.units: Percent out of total households in geography

variables.name: hh_internet_p
variables.description: Percent of households in geography with a broadband internet subscription
variables.units: Percent out of total households in geography

notes: GEOIDs correspond to Census tracts for the given year of the dataset. Note that Census tract boundaries have changed after the 2020 decennial census, which may affect geographic consistency over time.
